rank: Rank must be a string and is required.
actionCount: Action count must be an integer greater than or equal to 1.
rankId: Rank ID must be a valid Mongo ID.
actionCountFrom: Action count from must be a non-negative integer.
actionCountTo: Action count to must be a non-negative integer.
startDate: Start date must be a valid ISO 8601 date.
endDate: End date must be a valid ISO 8601 date.
expirationTimeArray: Expiration time must be an array with at least one element.
expirationTimeObject: Each expiration time must be an object.
expirationTimeInt: Each expiration time must be an integer greater than 0.
settingIdMongoId: Setting ID must be a valid Mongo ID.
expirationIdMongoId: Expiration ID must be a valid Mongo ID.
timeInt: Time must be an integer greater than 0.
comment: Comment is required and must be a string.
rate: Rate must be a float between 1 and 5.
project: Project must be a valid Mongo ID.
contract: contract must be a valid Mongo ID.
cycle: Cycle must be a valid value.
reviewId: Review ID must be a valid Mongo ID.
searchKeywordsArray: Search keywords must be an array with at least one element.
searchKeywordsString: Each search keyword must be a string.
customer: يجب أن يكون المستخدم معرف Mongo صحيح.
limit: Limit must be an integer greater than or equal to 1.
page: Page must be an integer greater than or equal to 1.
